column4: Flash plugin for firefox keeps crashing.  Any fix yet?  Running Ubuntu 8.04, official flash.
the best way to learn about linux is to intentionally break stuff and then try to fix it
rm -rf / will cause some hell in linux too
can you ping the other computer by IP?
if you are used to iTunes it will be more familiar
Request information on flash plugin for firefox.  Running Ubuntu 8.04, tried updating, etc, googled extensively, but I can't keep my browser from crashing when I play a flash video.
I mentioned 8.04 I thought.  If I forgot that, apologies.
Running ubuntu 8.04, official flash plugin, from the ubuntu-restricted-extras.
does about:plugins show the flash plugin
